mapper.insert: insert into DELIVERY_INFO(oid, sender, rec_name, rec_phone, rec_address, shipping_fee) values(#{oid}, #{sender}, #{rec_name}, #{rec_phone}, #{rec_address}, #{shipping_fee})

insert into order_t(oid, tid, qty, userid, address, phone, orderstat, orderdate, ordermemo, paymentmethod, approved_at) values(#{oid}, #{tid}, #{qty}, #{userid}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{orderstat}, #{orderdate}, #{ordermemo}, #{paymentmethod}, #{approved_at})
insert into order_detail(oid, productname, item_qty) values(#{oid}, #{productname}, #{item_qty})
